body: Got baited by the Loli thumbnail
how to be a coach no root
Plot seems to be like in Joshi luck... Still nice and fapable lol

There's 8 chapters plus what seems to be some sort of a bonus/ ".5" after in the JP version. 

Can say it looks like its going to be right up your alley if you like the sort of material thats been in the first 3 chapters for vanilla/harem content. A bit generic one could argue, but I'd say this series is cut above average if this is a genre you enjoy. Look forward to it lads. :D

Student side: 1st student = not a virgin. 2nd, 3rd = virgins, 4th student = unknown. 
Teacher side: protagonist teacher = virgin, senior teacher = unknown. There you go, folks. Full of sweet defloration and vanilla?
I'm really loving the stinger cards lol
